examples.example: 这个星期天我准备和家人一起去郊外享受美好的大自然。

translate.english: This Sunday I am going to go to the suburbs with my family to enjoy the beautiful nature.

examples.example: 每到星期天，我都会和朋友们一起愉快地玩耍，享受美好的时光。

translate.english: Every Sunday, I will play happily with my friends and enjoy the wonderful time.

examples.example: 每一个星期天我都会去做志愿者，为他人带去温暖和帮助。

translate.english: Every Sunday I will go to be a volunteer to bring warmth and help to others.
